  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_94333</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_94333</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Différence entre une étoile et une planète</string>
            <string language="en">Difference between a star and a planet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterschied zwischen einem Stern und einem 
Planeten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Diferença entre uma estrela e um planeta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Differenza fra una stella e un pianeta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαφορά μεταξύ ενός αστεριού και ενός πλανήτη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diferencia entre una estrella y un planeta</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Seconde sur deux illustrations montrant la  différence entre une étoile et une planète. C'est une  partie du ciel de nuit quelques semaines plus tard montrant que la  planète (rouge) s'est déplacée.</string>
            <string language="en">Second of two illustrations showing the difference between a star and a planet. This is a part of the night sky a few weeks later showing that the planet (red) has moved.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">La lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">nuit</string>
            <string language="en">Night</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">planète</string>
            <string language="en">Planet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">ciel</string>
            <string language="en">sky</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">étoile</string>
            <string language="en">star</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An zweiter Stelle von zwei Abbildungen, die den 
Unterschied zwischen einem Stern und einem Planeten zeigen. 
Dieses ist ein Teil des Nachthimmels einige Wochen später 
zeigend, daß der Planet (rot) bewogen hat.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo de duas ilustrações que mostram a 
diferença entre uma estrela e um planeta. Esta é uma parte do 
céu da noite algumas semanas que mostram mais tarde que o planeta 
(vermelho) se moveu.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo di due illustrazioni che 
evidenziano la differenza fra una stella e un pianeta. Ciò è 
una parte del cielo di notte alcune settimane più successivamente che
indicano che il pianeta (rosso) si è mosso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερη δύο απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν τη διαφορά 
μεταξύ ενός αστεριού και ενός πλανήτη. Αυτό είναι ένα 
μέρος του ουρανού νύχτας μερικές εβδομάδες δείχνοντας αργότερα 
ότι ο πλανήτης (κόκκινος) έχει κινηθεί.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar de dos ilustraciones que muestran
la diferencia entre una estrella y un planeta. Ésta es una 
parte del cielo de la noche algunas semanas que muestran más adelante
que el planeta (rojo) se ha movido.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nacht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Planet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Himmel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stern</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Noite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planeta</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
